channel.title: Need a coder
channel.description: Me and my friend got a forum and we want to create the client but we need a coder.If someone can create a client and we tell what we want then we can pay depending on the prices. Send me a mensage if u know how and ur good.email:harry.tigo@gmail.com If this is in the wrong section,please move to the correct one. Thanks.

item.title: Need a coder
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Requests are not allowed, sorry. Please make a development team in the relevant section if you wish to hire coders, however please bare in mind that you must have the need of a whole development team to make a topic there.

Read full topic
